description: Samuel Coggin at the Times Square "Kindness is Cool" event hosted by Gan Jing World on March 8, 2024. Samuel won the $10,000 top prize for his video about former NFL linebacker David Vobora's Adaptive Training Foundation and plans to use his prize to build a film company. (Larry Dye)
title: 14-Year-Old Wins $10,000 Prize in ‘Kindness Is Cool’ Gan Jing World Event

description: A smartphone and a computer screen displaying the logos of the social network Facebook and its parent company Meta on Jan. 12, 2023. (Lionel Bonaventure/AFP via Getty Images)
title: Dozens of State AGs Call on Meta to Take ‘Immediate Action’ After ‘Dramatic Increase’ in Account Takeovers
